text: Henry IV Probus (Latin for the Righteous) (; ) (c. 1258 – 23 June 1290) was a Duke of the Silesian territory of Wrocław (Lower Silesia) starting in 1266, and starting in 1288 High Duke of the Seniorate Province of Kraków until his death in 1290. He was the only son of Henry III the White, Duke of Wrocław, by his first wife Judith, daughter of Duke Konrad I of Masovia. Category:1250s births Category:1290 deaths Category:Polish dukes Category:Piast dynasty
title: Henry IV Probus
